column44: Hits on hull or armor frequently arc to weapons and engines, dealing extra EMP and energy damage. Hits on shields have a chance to generate a shield-penetrating arc based on the target's hard flux level.
%s Each submunition hit on hull deals an additional %s damage over %s seconds.
%s Each hit on hull deals an additional %s damage over %s seconds.
When impacting shields, a portion of its damage bypasses shielding, dealing up to %s of its damage directly to the target.
When impacting shields, a portion of its damage bypasses shielding, dealing up to %s of its damage directly to the target.
%s Each hit on hull deals an additional %s damage over %s seconds.
Hits on hull create massive spalling, dealing exponentially more damage based on the mass of the target.

When impacting shields, a portion of its damage bypasses shielding, dealing up to %s of its damage directly to the target.

Hits on hull or armor frequently arc to weapons and engines, dealing extra EMP and energy damage. Hits on shields have a chance to generate a shield-penetrating arc based on the target's hard flux level.
